parameter.name: Query
parameter.ns1:value: <Select xsi:type="selectType" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://www.ivoa.net/xml/ADQL/v1.0"> <?ag-adql-schema-version v1.0a1 ?> <Restrict Top="SUBS_TOP"/><SelectionList xsi:type="selectionListType"> <Item xsi:type="columnReferenceType" Table="a" Name="POS_EQ_RA"/><Item xsi:type="columnReferenceType" Table="a" Name="POS_EQ_DEC"/><Item xsi:type="binaryExprType" Oper="*"><Arg xsi:type="columnReferenceType" Table="a" Name="POS_EQ_RA"/><Arg xsi:type="columnReferenceType" Table="a" Name="POS_EQ_DEC"/></Item><Item xsi:type="columnReferenceType" Table="a" Name="CODE_QUALITY"/><Item xsi:type="columnReferenceType" Table="a" Name="PHOT_FLUX_PEAK"/><Item xsi:type="columnReferenceType" Table="a" Name="PHOT_FLUX_INT"/><Item xsi:type="columnReferenceType" Table="a" Name="PHOT_FLUX_ERROR"/><Item xsi:type="columnReferenceType" Table="a" Name="PHOT_FLUX_ERROR"/><Item xsi:type="columnReferenceType" Table="a" Name="EXTENSION_FWHM_MAJ"/><Item xsi:type="columnReferenceType" Table="a" Name="EXTENSION_FWHM_MIN"/><Item xsi:type="columnReferenceType" Table="a" Name="POS_POSANG"/><Item xsi:type="columnReferenceType" Table="a" Name="EXTENSION_FWHM_MAJ_FIT"/><Item xsi:type="columnReferenceType" Table="a" Name="EXTENSION_FWHM_MIN_FIT"/><Item xsi:type="columnReferenceType" Table="a" Name="POS_POSANG_FIT"/><Item xsi:type="columnReferenceType" Table="a" Name="ID_FIELD"/></SelectionList> <From xsi:type="fromType"> <Table xsi:type="tableType" Alias="a" Name="SUBS_TABLE"/></From> </Select>
